title: Establishes municipal liability relief
summary: Exempts tax districts from obligation or liability with respect to pre-existing environmental contamination or pollution; expands the jurisdiction of the court of claims; establishes there is an assumption of risk by public recreational facilities users.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act, in relation to expanding the jurisdiction of the court of claims; to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the exemption of tax districts from obligation or liability with respect to pre-existing environmental contamination or pollution; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to liability of public entities
